About

Ovax Global

Ovax Global is a secure placement of cryptocurrency in investment areas that you can see to the right of this text.
The crypto investors money is always at work, because we know how to do this for you as profitably and safely as possible.

Ovax Global is an investment crypto platform that received official registration of its own business in three countries at once. We are licensed financial and investment service providers in New Zealand, the United Kingdom and the Hong Kong.

Ovax Global’s business model consists in the intensive usage of investment cryptocurrency in several business areas at once, while the company steadily complies with all legal requirements related to the implementation of any financial transactions online and in full compliance with the transparency of its own business.
